DESCRIPTION: Gain #b15% of your max HP as #yBlock, set your base [E] to #b1. NL Effects that add [E] will still applies.
Increases #yStrength by #b2 when taking attack damage.
Deal #b30 damage at the end of your turn after #b3 turns.
Give #b3 #yStrength and Lose #b3 #yDexterity if any of the enemies does not intent to attack.
Activates when under #b50% of max HP. Creates a Slime Minion to help you.
